author: Kate Sullivan, CNN
title: Yang says Asian Americans being attacked over coronavirus is 'a heartbreaking phenomenon'
description: Former Democratic presidential candidate Andrew Yang said Thursday it is a "heartbreaking phenomenon" that Asian Americans have been the target of a growing number of racist and xenophobic attacks related to the coronavirus.
content:
Washington (CNN)Former Democratic presidential candidate Andrew Yang said Thursday it is a "heartbreaking phenomenon" that Asian Americans have been the target of a growing number of racist and xenophobic attacks related to the coronavirus.
